Html:
Hi,
first of all, I'm new to programming, so please be patient. I have a problem, that i can not find solution. I have two .xaml pages ex. Car.xaml and Plane.xaml, with the default source for Car:
<mui:Link DisplayName="Car" Source="Page/Car.xaml" />
I would like to change the source page for Plane.xaml, after user hits a button. How to manage it ? Any lead would be great.
I'll be very thankful to somebody who can help me.
Best Regards,
Cezary.
